column1: Kata Robata////Kata is the restaurant version of Lost In Translation: you will enter a sleek
column2: up-scale hotel; you will not need to know any Japanese or even see a Japanese person. You will meet other well-to-do people just like yourself
column3: and everything will have been crafted to make sure that nothing will disturb you. The food will be curated to be high quality
column4: and will perfectly fit your American tastes.
